name: Adventure Jump
description:
Description:

-Adventure Jump-adventure is a 2D platformer style. Which tells the story of a character named Eil.The game features the collector cap enemies.

Features:

- Complex levels

- A variety of hats and accessories

- Interesting enemies

- 1 very difficult boss

- A small storyline

- Dynamic effects

- Comfort Management

- Pixel graphics

Where the money goes each purchased version?-At Exit the game in Steam Greenlight!Please note that this is not the end of the game!

-This Is the first season
